name: RIFT RUSH
description:
RIFT RUSH

Rift Rush is a first-person platformer where your goal is to run through the empty void of time and space to close the rifts that are causing the destruction.
Use your grapple beam and your quick feet to traverse the procedurally generated landscape of debris and close the rifts as fast as you can.

Don't fall down...
